title: International Community Energy Living Labs
summary: The International Community Energy Living Labs (ICELL) project aims to create practical solutions for energy communities by analyzing international living labs. This project focuses on developing a systematic screening method for designing fossil-free energy systems, addressing technical, behavioral, regulatory, and legal challenges in building energy communities. ICELL prioritizes energy justice and attainable zero-emission strategies, placing the community at the heart of the process.
official_company_name: International Community Energy Living Labs (ICELL) Project
product_or_process: Systematic screening method for designing fossil-free energy systems
likely_naics_codes: ['541710 - Research and Development in the Physical, Engineering, and Life Sciences', '541990 - All Other Specialized Design Services', '221112 - Electric Power Generation, Transmission and Distribution', '541330 - Engineering Services']
greenwashing: The article does not indicate any misleading claims about the environmental benefits of the project, therefore it is not an example of greenwashing.
